mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.wx_user_id AS "WxUserId", a.last_login_date AS "lastLoginDate", a.last_login_hospital AS "hospital.id", a.wx_user_name AS "UserName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_user( id, wx_user_id, last_login_date, last_login_hospital, wx_user_name, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{WxUserId}, #{lastLoginDate}, #{hospital.id}, #{UserName}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_user SET wx_user_id = #{WxUserId}, last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate}, last_login_hospital = #{hospital.id}, wx_user_name = #{UserName}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
